languages.text: "Я уже не знаю, от чего моя башка трещит больше — от моих шепотков или его треклятых метафор. Почему нельзя просто сказать: "Это я спас ваши задницы, теперь сделай это, кокни вон тех выскочек и вали подобру-поздорову?"

traits.locale_text: "Я уже не знаю, от чего моя башка трещит больше — от моих шепотков или его треклятых метафор. Почему нельзя просто сказать: "Это я спас ваши задницы, теперь сделай это, кокни вон тех выскочек и вали подобру-поздорову?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"
languages.original_text: "Я уже не знаю, от чего моя башка трещит больше — от моих шепотков или его треклятых метафор. Почему нельзя просто сказать: "Это я спас ваши задницы, теперь сделай это, кокни вон тех выскочек и вали подобру-поздорову?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我说不好哪个更让我头疼，是我脑中的低语，还是他那些该死的谜语。他为什么就不能直接说：‘我救了你们一命，你们得替我办件事——干掉那些新上位的家伙，之后趁能跑的时候赶紧跑’？”
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: “我说不好哪个更让我头疼，是我脑中的低语，还是他那些该死的谜语。他为什么就不能直接说：‘我救了你们一命，你们得替我办件事——干掉那些新上位的家伙，之后趁能跑的时候赶紧跑’？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No sé qué me vuelve más loca, si mis susurros o sus condenadas metáforas. ¿Por qué no puede decir algo como "os he salvado el culo, ahora ayudadme a mí: reventad a estos payasos y largaos de aquí"?».
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: «No sé qué me vuelve más loca, si mis susurros o sus condenadas metáforas. ¿Por qué no puede decir algo como "os he salvado el culo, ahora ayudadme a mí: reventad a estos payasos y largaos de aquí"?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「頭の中のささやきとあいつの忌々しい比喩と、どっちがうっとうしいのかわかりやしない。『お前らを救ってやったんだから、今度は俺の変わりに奴らを始末してくれ』ってはっきり言えばいいじゃない」
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: 「頭の中のささやきとあいつの忌々しい比喩と、どっちがうっとうしいのかわかりやしない。『お前らを救ってやったんだから、今度は俺の変わりに奴らを始末してくれ』ってはっきり言えばいいじゃない」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mir schlimmer den Verstand raubt — mein Geflüster oder seine verfluchten Metaphern. Warum kann er nicht einfach sagen: 'Ich habe Euch den Arsch gerettet, jetzt tut Ihr mir einen Gefallen — legt diese Emporkömmlinge um und verschwindet, so schnell Ihr könnt'?"
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mir schlimmer den Verstand raubt — mein Geflüster oder seine verfluchten Metaphern. Warum kann er nicht einfach sagen: 'Ich habe Euch den Arsch gerettet, jetzt tut Ihr mir einen Gefallen — legt diese Emporkömmlinge um und verschwindet, so schnell Ihr könnt'?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas ce qui me perturbe le plus : mes propres murmures ou ses fichues métaphores. Ce ne serait pas plus simple de dire : "Je vous ai sauvé les miches, alors renvoyez-moi l'ascenseur en liquidant ces arrivistes et filez tant que vous le pouvez" ? »
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas ce qui me perturbe le plus : mes propres murmures ou ses fichues métaphores. Ce ne serait pas plus simple de dire : "Je vous ai sauvé les miches, alors renvoyez-moi l'ascenseur en liquidant ces arrivistes et filez tant que vous le pouvez" ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Fısıltılar mı yoksa kahrolası mecazi lafları mı... Hangisi kafamı daha çok karıştırıyor, emin olamıyorum. 'Götünüzü kurtardım, siz de benim istediğimi yapın... Bu zıpçıktıları dövüp fırsatınız varken kaçın.' dese olmaz mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "I don't know what's doing my head in more — my whispers or his damned metaphors. Why can't he just say, 'I saved your asses, now do this for me — whack these upstarts and get out while you can'?"

traits.locale_text: "Hangisi kafamı daha çok karıştırıyor, emin olamıyorum... Fısıltılar mı, yoksa kahrolası mecazi lafları mı? 'Götünüzü kurtardım, siz de benim istediğimi yapın... Bu zıpçıktıları dövüp fırsatınız varken kaçın' dese olmuyor muydu?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
